root.Summary: 1: Paemka L, Mahajan VB, Ehaideb SN, Skeie JM, Tan MC, Wu S, Cox AJ, Sowers LP,Gecz J, Jolly L, Ferguson PJ, Darbro B, Schneider A, Scheffer IE, Carvill GL,Mefford HC, El-Shanti H, Wood SA, Manak JR, Bassuk AG.
